title: Welcome
text:
Welcome to the “What Grad School Don’t Teach You: Tools for Transparent and Reproducible Research”. The course website can be found at where you will also find a copy of the slides.

Contents

Understand the chaos in research
importance of reproducible research and technical writing
tools for version control and technical writing



Target Audience

Research schoalrs
Acedemic Instructors



Prerequisites
Almost None to get a ‘whirlwind tour’. But certainly lot to learn!!
